package.name: Net_LMTP
package.summary: Provides an implementation of the RFC2033 LMTP protocol
package.description: Provides an implementation of the RFC2033 LMTP using PEAR's Net_Socket and Auth_SASL class.

release.notes: * Fixed a bug in SIZE handling (thanks to Steffen Hansen for bug report) * Marked as Stable
* Removed dependency on Auth_SASL, but if installed automatically uses it probiding DIGEST-MD5 and CRAM-MD5 auth methods * Marked as stable
- Fixed a bug in DIGEST-MD5 Auth Method. - Now Uses defaults values in constructor.
- All methods are implemmented based on Net_SMTP
